scripts.sass: npx sass public/scss/common.scss public/css/common.css --no-source-map && npx sass public/scss/main.scss public/css/main.css --no-source-map && npx sass public/scss/carInfo.scss public/css/carInfo.css --no-source-map && npx sass public/scss/carCompare.scss public/css/carCompare.css --no-source-map && npx sass public/scss/community.scss public/css/community.css --no-source-map && npx sass public/scss/communityDetail.scss public/css/communityDetail.css --no-source-map
